archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0929
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a finance user, I require discounts/credits to be apportioned across the services delivered where appropriate (i.e. credit for billing issue for a converged customer to be split across mobile and broadband).

properties.value: Rules for split needs to be provided by VF or example. DX response: Account level discounts/credits currently split 45% to fixed and 55% to mobile, and we would like to be able to change the percentages as appropriate and services change. Converged services for base 2 or 3 correct?

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
